Package game

Class PlayerList

java.lang.Object
game.PlayerList
public class PlayerList extends Object
Class representing the collective list of players.
Author:
Jonas, Mohamad, Viktoria

    • compareUsedPiles

      public Player compareUsedPiles()
      Returns the player with the highest used pile value. Used to determine who wins incase of a tie of a comperasion of the hands.
      Returns:
      the player with the highest used pile value
